text: وَلَمَّا ضُرِبَ ٱبْنُ مَرْيَمَ مَثَلًا إِذَا قَوْمُكَ مِنْهُ يَصِدُّونَ

translation.en.sahih: And when the son of Mary was presented as an example, immediately your people laughed aloud.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan tatkala putra Maryam (Isa) dijadikan perumpamnaan tiba-tiba kaummu (Quraisy) bersorak karenanya.
